{"id":887472640,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"4Â months","timestamp":1674998070,"status":15,"status_display":"Runtime Error","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/887472640/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"String to Integer (atoi)","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    void solve(int& ans, string str, int i) {\n        if(i < 0) return;\n\n        if(str[i] == '-') ans = -1 * ans;\n        else ans += ((str[i] - '0') * pow(10,(str.size()-i-1)));\n        \n        solve(ans,str,i-1);\n    }\n  \npublic:\n    int myAtoi(string s) {\n        // ignore leading space and anything after the digits.\n        bool firstDigit = false;\n\n        string str = \"\";\n\n        int i=0; \n        while(i < s.size()) {\n            if(s[i] == ' ') i++;\n            else if(s[i] == '-' || (s[i] >= '0' && s[i] <= '9')) break;\n            else return 0;\n        }\n\n        // the first character is a minus or number\n        str.push_back(s[i]);\n        i++;\n\n        while(i < s.size()) {\n            if((s[i] >= '0' && s[i] <= '9')) {\n                str.push_back(s[i]);\n            }\n            else break;\n            i++;    \n        }\n\n        cout << str;\n        int ans = 0;\n        solve(ans, str, str.size()-1);\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"string-to-integer-atoi","has_notes":false}
